SUI affect woman age result significant emotional distress . The purpose study evaluate non-surgical , investigational treatment intend reduce eliminate urine leakage due stress urinary incontinence .
DOC.brief_title: The AttenueX IntraVesical System Treatment Female Stress Urinary Incontinence
DOC.detailed_description: A multicenter , prospective , randomize , single-blinded , two-arm longitudinal trial safety effectiveness AttenueX Device reduce incontinence . Subjects randomize control arm AttenueX Device insert end 3-month control period . For subject randomize treatment group , AttenueX Device insert bladder Day 0 , replace every 90 day new device nine month . Subjects randomize treatment group follow minimum 12 month receive AttenueX Device , subject randomize control group follow 3 month without AttenueX Device minimum 12 month receive AttenueX Device .
DOC.criteria: Female subject ≥ 18 year age Experienced stress urinary incontinence ( SUI ) least 12months fail prior nonsurgical treatment VLPP ≥ 60cm H20 Stamey Grade ≥ 1 Free local skin infection , impassable urethral stricture , trauma necrosis Provide write informed consent Pregnant planning pregnancy 3 urinary tract infection within previous year Intrinsic sphincter deficiency Incontinence surgery within previous 6months Cystocele ≥ grade 3 Previous pelvic radiation therapy Presence urethral abnormality Recent urosepsis History interstitial follicular cystitis Uncontrolled diabetes Biofeedback within previous 3 month Morbid obesity Use anticoagulants aspirin
